Question
========

A couple wants to have one child, what is the outcomes space for this event?

Answerlist
----------

* S = {one girl, one boy}
* S = {one girl and one boy}
* S = {one boy}
* S = {one girl}

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* S = {one girl, one boy}: Correct
* S = {one girl and one boy}: Incorrect
* S = {one boy}: Incorrect
* S = {one girl}: Incorrect
